title: Britney Spears makes upside down look effortless in gravity-defying gymnastics videos
text:
CLOSE Britney Spears lost custody of her two children with Kevin Federline. (Oct. 3) AP Entertainment

Not even gravity can keep Britney Spears down.

The "Stronger" songstress took to Instagram Sunday to update fans on her return to gymnastics. Last Tuesday, the 37-year-old revealed she was taking up the high-flying hobby again after a one-year hiatus.

Spears' latest post shows her upside down in the air, supported by boyfriend Sam Asghari, 25.

The singer rocks a bright blue bikini as she demos several topsy-turvy moves, including wrapping around Asghari's back while upside down and walking on her hands as he guides her.

"Only in LA can you wear a bathing suit in October!" Spears captioned her post. "It’s so beautiful out .... and first time to walk on my hands up and down stairs ....."

Why does Britney Spears still have a conservator? Legal expert says her case file suggests answers

Spears announced her return to gymnastics in an Instagram post last Tuesday that saw her doing backflips and walking on her hands with Asghari by her side.

"It’s been exactly a year today since I’ve done gymnastics .... lol," she wrote. "Such a beautiful day to play outside and work up a sweat with the help of this mate !!! As you can see, my back is too stiff on my back walkovers !! He’s trying to loosen me up and he’s great !!! Such a fun day !!!!"

Asghari complimented his girlfriend in the comments.

"Flipping into my heart like," he wrote, adding a fire emoji.

Britney Spears gushes over 'hot' boyfriend Sam Asghari: 'I can't believe I wake up every morning to this man'

See our full coverage of entertainment news

description: Britney Spears bends over backwards (literally) for boyfriend Sam Asghari. See her return to gymnastics after a yearlong hiatus.
